property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FlattenerPreference &#40;a Spread).

property.name: rasterVectorBalance
property.shortdesc: The amount of vector artwork to rasterize during flattening, specified as an enumerator or as a percentage in the range 0 to 100. Can return: FlattenerLevel enumerator or Real &#40;0 - 100).

property.name: lineArtAndTextResolution
property.shortdesc: The resolution for vector objects rasterized as a result of flattening. &#40;Range: 1 to 9600) For information, see raster vector balance.

property.name: gradientAndMeshResolution
property.shortdesc: The resolution for gradients rasterized as a result of flattening and for drop shadow and feathers when printed or exported. &#40;Range: 0 to 1200) Note: Resolutions higher than 300 ppi increase file size and printing time but generally do not improve the image quality.

property.name: clipComplexRegions
property.shortdesc: If true, ensures that the boundaries between vector and rasterized artwork fall along object paths.

property.name: convertAllStrokesToOutlines
property.shortdesc: If true, converts all strokes to outlines and ensures that stroke widths remain constant during flattening. Note: Can cause thin strokes to appear slightly thicker than their original width. Affects all strokes, not only strokes involved in the transparency.

property.name: convertAllTextToOutlines
property.shortdesc: If true, converts all text to outlines and discards all type glyph information on spreads with transparency; ensures that the width of text strokes remains constant during flattening. Note: Can cause small fonts to appear slightly thicker when viewed in Acrobat or printed on low-quality desktop printers, but does not affect type quality when printed on high-resolution printers or imagesetters.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FlattenerPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
